scripts.bundle: browserify -o app/assets/javascripts/bundle.js --noparse=node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js --noparse=node_modules/underscore/underscore.js -r jquery -r underscore -r react/addons -r ./app/assets/javascripts/main.js:wincent -t [ reactify --everything --harmony ]
scripts.watch-js: watchify -d -o app/assets/javascripts/bundle.js --noparse=node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js --noparse=node_modules/underscore/underscore.js -r jquery -r underscore -r react/addons -r ./app/assets/javascripts/main.js:wincent -t [ reactify --everything --harmony ]
